this.onInit = (data,schema) => 
	new Promise((resolve,reject) => resolve())

this.onForm = (data,schema) => 
	new Promise((resolve,reject) => resolve({data:data,schema}))

this.onSave = (data,schema) => 
	new Promise((resolve,reject) => resolve({data:data,schema}))

this.onAction = (action,param) => this.trigger(action,param)
